flavorText: Some mages forsake their scrolls and libraries to learn at the feet of ancient trees and sacred stones.

foreignData.flavorText: Manche Magier verzichten auf ihre Schriftrollen und Bibliotheken, um zu Füßen von uralten Bäumen und heiligen Steinen zu lernen.
foreignData.name: Muraganda-Petroglyphen

foreignData.flavorText: Algunos magos abandonan sus pergaminos y bibliotecas para aprender a los pies de antiguos árboles y piedras sagradas.
foreignData.name: Petroglifos muraganda

foreignData.flavorText: Certains mages abandonnent leurs parchemins et leurs bibliothèques pour s'ouvrir à la connaissance des arbres ancestraux et des pierres sacrées.
foreignData.name: Pétroglyphes de Muraganda

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni maghi rinunciano alle loro pergamene e biblioteche per studiare ai piedi di alberi antichi e pietre sacre.
foreignData.name: Petroglifi di Muraganda

foreignData.flavorText: 魔道士の中には、巻物や書を捨て、古木の根元や聖なる石から学ぼうとするものがいる。
foreignData.name: ムラガンダの印刻
foreignData.text: 能力を持たないすべてのクリーチャーは＋２/＋２の修整を受ける。

foreignData.flavorText: Alguns magos abandonam seus pergaminhos e bibliotecas para aprender aos pés de árvores ancestrais e pedras sagradas.
foreignData.name: Petróglifos de Muraganda

foreignData.flavorText: Некоторые маги оставляют манускрипты и библиотеки, чтобы постичь мудрость у подножия древних деревьев и священных камней.
foreignData.name: Мурагандские Петроглифы

foreignData.flavorText: 某些法师丢下了卷轴与藏书，转而求教于古树圣石。
foreignData.name: 莫甘达岩画

foreignData.flavorText: 某些法師丟下了卷軸與藏書，轉而求教於古樹聖石。
foreignData.name: 莫甘達岩畫

name: Muraganda Petroglyphs

rulings.text: Any text on a creature is an ability, even if that text isn’t currently applicable (such as a cycling ability of a creature).
If a land with a basic land type becomes a creature, the intrinsic mana ability it has stops Muraganda Petroglyphs from applying to it.

If an effect says that an affected creature “has” or “gains” an ability, Muraganda Petroglyphs won’t apply to that creature because it has gained an ability. If an effect simply says that something is true of an affected creature (such as “target creature can’t be blocked this turn”) then that effect isn’t causing the creature to gain an ability.

Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to a creature with no abilities may become lethal if that creature gains an ability or Muraganda Petroglyphs leaves the battlefield during that turn.
